item.title: Learnings - May 6 2021
item.description: firebase vs amplify - both simplify cloud app dev with deploy, cicd, storage,auth featurees. amplify is aws, firebase is google vscode shortcuts ( windows keyboard on mac ) alt j - toggle terminal alt b - toggle explorer window,shift, o - remove unused imports hugo supports tags, categories out of the box show hidden file on finder(mac) - alt-shift
